message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
I can do better than that! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth more than that. How about we compromise at $95?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I still think the product is worth a bit more than that. How about we meet you at $94?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $91?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal! I can see you're really interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you at $93. What do you think?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think we can find a mutually beneficial price. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $90, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer. How about we meet at $92.5?
I'm not willing to go above $90, and I'm getting close to walking away. Would you be willing to meet me at $90 and call it a day?
